ApplyDiskBackup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyDiskBackup
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DiskId": "disk-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskBackupId": "dbp-xxxxxxxx"
}
ApplyDiskBackup.title: Rolling back a backup point to the original cloud disk

BindAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: Binding a scheduled snapshot policy to a single cloud disk

CopySnapshotCrossRegions.title: Replicating a snapshot from Guangzhou to Beijing

CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.document: This example shows you how to create and bind a scheduled snapshot policy to a cloud disk, for which a snapshot will be created at 00:00 every Friday.
CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: Creating a scheduled snapshot policy

CreateDisks.document: This example shows you how to purchase a prepaid 50 GB HDD cloud disk in Guangzhou Zone 2 for one month, assign it to project 0, get a notification upon expiration, and enable automatic renewal for it.
CreateDisks.title: Purchasing a cloud disk with basic parameters

CreateDisks.document: This example shows you how to create an hourly pay-as-you-go 100 GB premium cloud disk in Guangzhou Zone 3.
CreateDisks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDisks
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DiskName": "postPayDisk",
    "Placement": {
        "ProjectId": "0",
        "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
    },
    "DiskChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "DiskCount": "1",
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_PREMIUM",
    "DiskSize": "100"
}
CreateDisks.title: Creating an hourly pay-as-you-go cloud disk

CreateDisks.document: This example shows you how to create a cloud disk by specifying a snapshot without specifying `DiskSize`. In this example, the size of the new cloud disk is the same as that of the snapshot, and the snapshot data will be copied to the new cloud disk.
CreateDisks.title: Creating a cloud disk by using a snapshot

CreateSnapshot.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSnapshot
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SnapshotName": "snap_201711301015",
    "Deadline": "2022-01-08T09:47:55+00:00",
    "DiskId": "disk-lzrg2pwi"
}
CreateSnapshot.title: Creating a snapshot

DeleteDiskBackups.title: Deleting the backup points of a cloud disk

DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicies.title: Querying scheduled snapshot policies in the `NORMAL` state

DescribeDiskAssociatedAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: Querying the scheduled snapshot policies associated with a cloud disk whose ID is `disk-dw0bbzws`

DescribeDiskBackups.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDiskBackups
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0
}
DescribeDiskBackups.title: Querying the list of backup points

DescribeDiskConfigQuota.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDiskConfigQuota
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InquiryType": "INQUIRY_CBS_CONFIG",
    "DiskChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "Zones": [
        "ap-shanghai-5"
    ],
    "DiskTypes": [
        "CLOUD_PREMIUM"
    ]
}
DescribeDiskConfigQuota.title: Querying the purchasable specifications of Premium Cloud Disk in Shanghai Zone 5

DescribeDiskOperationLogs.title: Querying the operation logs of a cloud disk

    "DiskId": "disk-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskBackupQuota": 1
}

InquiryPriceResizeDisk.title: Querying the price for expanding a cloud disk to 200 GB

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.document: This example shows you how to rename a scheduled snapshot policy to `data_disk_auto_snapshot` and set the `IsPermanent` parameter to `TRUE` to permanently retain the snapshots created according to the scheduled snapshot policy.
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute
<Common request parameters>

{
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyId": "asp-nqu08k2l",
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyName": "data_disk_auto_snapshot",
    "IsPermanent": "TRUE"
}
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.title: Modifying the attributes of a scheduled snapshot policy

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute
<Common request parameters>

    "AutoSnapshotPolicyId": "asp-01928374",
    "IsActivated": "true"
}

}
